name: Intertec International
description:
Intertec International is an IT & Technical Services company founded in 2002 with headquarters in Phoenix, Arizona and has offices located throughout the United States, United Kingdom, and a Nearshore Technology Center in Costa Rica.
With 14+ years of experience working with Fortune 500 Companies, we have a proven track record of solving complex technical problems through customized solutions. We’ve served multiple industries including, but not limited to, Financial Services, Insurance, Technology, Direct Sales and Aerospace, Government & Industrial Sectors. 
Our service offerings in the IT Industry include: Software Engineering, Project and Program Management, Business Analysis, Test Engineering and Quality Assurance, Technical Advisory and Infrastructure Management. 
Our Engineering Technical Services include:  Product Design & Analysis, Program & Project Management, Technical Publications & Graphic Illustrations, Mechanical & Electrical Project Engineering, Software & Embedded Systems, Supply Chain & Procurement, Subject Matter Experts & Advocacy.
